description: This document specifies the ORIGIN frame for HTTP/2, to indicate what origins are available on a given connection.  Note to Readers Discussion of this draft takes place on the HTTP working group mailing list (ietf-http-wg@w3.org), which is archived at https://lists.w3.org/Archives/Public/ietf-http-wg/.  Working Group information can be found at http://httpwg.github.io/; source code and issues list for this draft can be found at https://github.com/httpwg /http-extensions/labels/origin-frame.
title: The ORIGIN HTTP/2 Frame
